title: Oi! Ryouma (Rainbow Samurai)
synopsis: In the middle of the 19th century, Japan was still closed off from the outside world. There were just the beginning signs of reformation in the long regime of Shogun Tokugawa.
staff: [['Kagawa, Yutaka', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Daichi, Akitarou', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Iwasaki, Yoshiaki', ['Episode Director']]]
